QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Since removable PhysicalMedia can be dual-sided, there is the possibility for StorageExtents to be realized on a single side of the Media. This association is a specialization of the RealizesExtent relationship, adding a Side property to express the Media's orientation details.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The PhysicalMedia on which the Extent is realized.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The StorageExtent that is located on the Component.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: An enumeration expressing on which 'Side' the Extent is realized. Since sides can be named by various schemes (0/1 or A/B), both schemes are expressed in the Values array of this property.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The starting address on the PhysicalComponent where the StorageExtent begins. Ending address of the StorageExtent is determined using the NumberOfBlocks and Block Size properties of the StorageExtent object.
